attributes.action: Colour coding of medicine bottle lids.
attributes.additional_details:
Many children in the UK suffer injury, and a small number die because of accidental overdose.

Often this is a simple mistake on the part of the parent, where the wrong medicine is administered.

We propose that a colour coding system be introduced for medicine bottle lids so that medicines can easily be distinguished.

i)   Green  - For over the counter medicines (liquid paracetomol etc.)
ii)  Orange - For prescription medicines
iii)  Red     - For controlled substances (Opiates etc.)

We would like this system to be made mandatory in the UK.
